Title: eGrid_Windows7
Description: eGrid is a multi-touch tabletop application designed for the operation of control rooms of utility companies. The current version runs on windows 7, using WPF 4.0, the Microsoft Surface Toolkit and TouchToolkit.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
eGrid is a multi-touch tabletop application designed for the operation of control rooms of utility companies. The current version runs on windows 7, using WPF 4.0, the Microsoft Surface Toolkit and TouchToolkit.
